title: London/Hammersmith and Fulham
name: Fulham Palace
content: The former retreat of the Bishops of London now incorporates Bishop's Park and is a lovely green area in a heavily built part of London as well as home to some important historic buildings. Also a museum which charts the history of the palace back to the 11th century and a small cafe. | image=Fulham Palace, Bishop's Park. - geograph.org.uk - 27849.jpg
